name: Blast
shortDescription: A multichain, subscription-based, API platform, providing access to the hottest blockchain networks
description: BLAST delivers a high-tech proprietary solution for proxying and routing user requests allowing it to achieve best-in-industry response times and top-notch reliability. Moreover, the platform features stable-coin crypto payments, and it allows users to simply connect with their Metamask wallets to create an account and obtain their custom API endpoints in just a couple of clicks. For increased convenience and ease of use, Public APIs are also available in Blast, for all supported networks.
